verse.name: v1
verse.lines: O land of rest, for thee I sigh! When will the moment come When I shall lay my armor by, And dwell in peace at home?

verse.name: c
verse.lines: We'll work till Jesus comes, We'll work till Jesus comes; We'll work till Jesus comes, And we'll be gathered home.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: To Jesus Christ I fled for rest; He bade me cease to roam, And lean for comfort on His breast Till He conduct me home.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: I sought at once my Savior's side, No more my steps to roam; With Him I'll brave death's chilling tide, And reach my heav'nly home.
